member.name: ID2D1Device1.GetRenderingPriority
member.summary: Retrieves the current rendering priority of the device.
member.returns: The current rendering priority of the device.

member.name: ID2D1Device1.SetRenderingPriority
member.summary: Sets the priority of Direct2D rendering operations performed on any device context associated with the device.
member.param: The desired rendering priority for the device and associated contexts.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1Device1
member.summary: Represents a resource domain whose objects and device contexts can be used together. This interface performs all the same functions as the existing interface. It also enables control of the device's rendering priority.
